text:
🔖Yishun Park Amphitheatre is located near Safra Yishun Clubhouse.
🎭It's an open-air performance space that can host events and activities like outdoor concerts, plays and community gatherings.
💃🕺🦹Nestled amidst lush greenery, the tiered seating arrangement of the Amphitheatre creates an interactive setting for both the audiences and performaners.
🎭🧙The Amphitheatre can be rented for events.
Access NParks website for details.
